page.title: 01AGRICULTURE Mr Pavey
page.content: Mr Pavey has been the local baker for 34 years. He also farms Jadewood(24.5 acres).His special interest is in breeding shire horses.He has 8 cattle and 100+ pigs.It is no wonder he works a 20-hour day. The{bakery}is in Marnhull and his loaves are sold in Todber, Stour Row,Marnhull and Sturminster Newton.He bakes a course brown loaf which is crisp and nutty.It contains no preservatives. The{farm}is tucked under Duncliffe Wood and deer,foxes and rabbits are often seen in the fields. On our visit the doughnuts were delicious!
